description: The humor reflects on modern digital habits even in winter.
title: Winter Scrolls
n_1: Eddy and Mira bundle up for a winter day.
c2_1: Absolutely, got my gear right here!
n_2: They head outside, breath visible in the cold air.
n_3: Eddy looks confused, Mira pulls out her phone.
c2_3: Yeah, North America's favorite winter sport!
n_4: They laugh, scrolling through their phones in the snow.
c2_4: Told you it's the best winter activity!
